name: Number Hunting (Run in full screen plz)
name_original: Number Hunting (Run in full screen plz)
description:
Make sure to run in full screen, please!

If you click Quit, the game will crash. Don't worry, refresh the page, and you will be good to go!

This is a 1 vs 1 shooting game. The red player is the attacking side, which needs to destroy the blue square; the blue player is the defending side, which needs to survive to the end. 

The tour video and exciting replays are available on my Youtube Channel, please visit https://www.youtube.com/@louisproduction2331/videos

All my games are nonprofit！
